Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local HandleTouchConn = nil local MyCharacter = nil local MyHumanoid = nil local MyPlayer = nil local Players = Game:GetService('Players') local Cleaner = script:WaitForChild('Cleaner') local Ragdoller = script:WaitForChild('Ragdoller') local Rimshot = Handle:WaitForChild('Rimshot')
local function New(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else if type(v) == 'function' then obj[k]:connect(v) else obj[k] = v end end end return obj end end
local Animations = {} local function PlayAnimation(animationName, speed) speed = speed or 1 if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Play(0.1, 1, speed) else print("Can't find animation:" , animationName) end end
local function StopAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Stop() end end
local function LoadAnimation(animationObject) if MyHumanoid then Animations[animationObject.Name] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(animationObject) else print("Tried to load an anim without a humanoid") end end
local function FindCharacterAncestor(part) if part then if part:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then return part end return FindCharacterAncestor(part.Parent) end end
local function CreateDrum() local drum = New'Part' { TopSurface = 'Smooth'; BottomSurface = 'Smooth'; FormFactor = 'Custom'; CanCollide = true; Name = 'Drum'; Size = Vector3.new(4,2.5,4); Shape = 'Ball'; New'SpecialMesh' { MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=139468173'; TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=139432181'; Scale = Vector3.new(2,2,2); } } return drum end
local function WeldDrum(drum, torso) if drum and torso then local weld = New'Weld' { Name = 'DrumWeld'; Part0 = drum; Part1 = torso; C0 = (CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, 0.2, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi * 0.4, 0, 0); C1 = CFrame.new(); } weld.Parent = drum else print("WeldDrum: Invalid drum or torso") end end
local function DisconnectTouch() if HandleTouchConn then HandleTouchConn:disconnect() HandleTouchConn = nil end end
local function OnTouched(hitPart) local hitCharacter = FindCharacterAncestor(hitPart) if MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 and hitCharacter and hitCharacter ~= MyCharacter then local drum = CreateDrum() local torso = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if torso and hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 and not hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Drum') then local clonedCleaner = Cleaner:Clone() local clonedRagdoller = Ragdoller:Clone() drum.Parent = hitCharacter clonedRagdoller.Parent = hitCharacter clonedRagdoller.Disabled = false clonedCleaner.Parent = drum clonedCleaner.Disabled = false WeldDrum(drum, torso) if Rimshot then Rimshot:Play() end torso.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.1, 0.3) DisconnectTouch() end end end
local function OnActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false PlayAnimation('Swing', 0.8) wait(0.2) HandleTouchConn = Handle.Touched:connect(OnTouched) wait(0.5) DisconnectTouch() wait(2) Tool.Enabled = true end
local AnimConn = nil local function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') MyPlayer = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter)
AnimConn = Tool.ChildAdded:connect(function (child) if child:IsA('Animation') then LoadAnimation(animationObject) end end) for _, child in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('Animation') then LoadAnimation(child) end end end
local function OnUnequipped() DisconnectTouch() if Rimshot then Rimshot:Stop() end for name, animTrack in pairs(Animations) do StopAnimation(name); end if AnimConn then AnimConn:disconnect() AnimConn = nil end end
do Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) end
local Debris = Game:GetService('Debris') local DebrisItem = script.Parent Debris:AddItem(DebrisItem, 5)

local Debris = Game:GetService('Debris') local Character = script.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local BAV = script:WaitForChild('BAV') local Torso = Character:FindFirstChild('Torso')
if Humanoid then Humanoid.PlatformStand = true if Torso then BAV.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(1,5), (12 + math.random(0,8)), math.random(1,5)) BAV.Parent = Torso end wait(1) if BAV then BAV:Destroy() end wait(2) Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end
wait(3) script:Destroy()

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
